step_data.thought: I have completed reviewing the promotional activities listed under the 'Cart Price Rules' section. Now, I will send a message to the user to inform them that I have checked the MARKETING section for promotional activities.
step_data.action: stop('I have checked the MARKETING section for promotional activities and reviewed the listed rules.')
